name: Staff of the Arcane
description: A mystical staff imbued with powerful arcane energies.
looks: The staff is made of polished ebony and adorned with intricate silver engravings. It crackles with magical energy and emits a faint glow.

special_effects.arcane_blast: Unleashes a powerful blast of arcane energy that damages all enemies in an area.

name: Spellbook of Fireball
description: A spellbook that contains the knowledge of casting fireball spells.
looks: The spellbook has a leather cover with intricate gold designs. The pages inside are made of enchanted parchment that illuminates when spells are cast.

special_effects.area_damage: Fireball explodes on impact, damaging all enemies in the area.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A staff imbued with healing energies, capable of restoring health to allies.
looks: The staff is made of smooth, polished wood with intricate carvings of leaves and vines. The top of the staff is adorned with a glowing crystal that emits a soft green light.

special_effects.healing_touch: Restores 20 health to the target with each successful hit.

name: Life Staff
description: A mystical staff that emanates healing energy.
looks: The staff is made of a smooth white wood with golden accents. It emits a soft, warm glow.

special_effects.healing_over_time: Heals the target for 10 HP over 5 seconds.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Staff of Healing
description: A mystical staff that channels healing energy.
looks: The staff has a wooden shaft with intricate carvings of vines and flowers. The top of the staff is adorned with a crystal orb that glows with a soft, healing light.

special_effects.healing_touch: Increases the effectiveness of healing spells and abilities.

name: Ring of Protection
description: A magical ring that provides enhanced protection to the wearer.
looks: The ring has a simple design with a smooth metallic band.

special_effects.shielding: Creates a protective shield around the wearer, reducing incoming damage.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Staff of Healing
description: A staff infused with powerful healing magic.
looks: The staff has a slender wooden handle with a crystal orb at the top. The orb emits a soft glow and is surrounded by swirling light.

special_effects.healing_touch: Increases the effectiveness of healing spells and abilities.
special_effects.regeneration: Provides passive MP regeneration over time.
